vulnerability.name: USN-4290-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4290-1 fixed a vulnerability in libpam-radius-auth. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM and Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that libpam-radius-auth incorrectly handled certain long  passwords. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause  libpam-radius-auth to crash, resulting in a denial of service.

statements.status_notes: libpam-radius-auth could be made to crash if it received specially crafted network traffic. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
